name: My Pet Kingdom - Game Jam Edition
name_original: My Pet Kingdom - Game Jam Edition
description:
This is my submission for the #LOWREZJAM game jam!

Manage a miniature kingdom by collecting resources and redistributing them! Watch tiny peasants wander aimlessly or cut down trees!

Warning: the game has no save feature, so once you quit you'll have to start all over!

INSTRUCTIONS:

- Wait for resources to appear and click on them. Only one ever appears at a time.

- Drop water on fertile ground to make farms.

- Plant wheat to make homes.

- Build homes near trees to make the inhabitants cut down the trees.

- Build log cabins near boulders to collect stones.

- Try to build a tower, a well and some rose bushes!

Follow me at my Patreon for news on future projects and game development!
